thread.title: EastEnders shock for Michelle Fowler as her illegal student lover arrives | Metro News
thread.title_full: EastEnders shock for Michelle Fowler as her illegal student lover arrives | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: EastEnders shock for Michelle Fowler as her illegal student lover arrives | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 7:55 pm (Picture: BBC) 
Well, he was always going to turn up wasn’t he? Any EastEnders fans wondering whether Michelle Fowler’s underage student secret had been conveniently brushed under the carpet were given their answer tonight when American Lester rocked up with a corner shop box of chocolates and a sloppy smooch for his older lover. 
Michelle had to leave the US after her affair with the 17-year-old was exposed given that it is illegal both due to his age and the fact that he was technically a student under her care. 
But she has insisted that they were in love – something which seems to be two sided as Lester has followed her and managed to track her down to Walford. (Picture: BBC) 
Having waited outside the Fowlers’ for her, he stunned her by emerging from the shadows but it was only a few seconds before they had their arms around each other and were engaging in a furious kiss. 
But how will Michelle’s loved ones and neighbours react to Lester’s arrival? And will he stick around? 
EastEnders continues on Thursday 16 February at 7:30pm on BBC One.
